security_audit.summary: All 112 static findings are false positives. The scanner misidentifies template literals as shell backticks, flags standard API usage as network risks, and interprets environment variable access as credential exposure. This is a legitimate content automation tool that makes transparent network calls to public hot list APIs and uses Anthropic API for content generation. No data exfiltration, no malicious patterns, no hidden behavior.

content.user_title: Generate viral content from hot topics
content.value_statement: This skill automates viral content creation by fetching trending topics from TopHub and using AI to generate articles in the popular Defou x Stanley style. Save hours of research and writing while producing engaging, shareable content.
actual_capabilities: Fetches real-time hot topics from TopHub platform
Uses AI to select top 10 topics with viral potential
Generates three content versions per topic (Stanley, Defou, Combo styles)
Creates four engaging hooks for each article
Saves all content as formatted Markdown files
limitations: Requires Anthropic API key for content generation
Content is in Simplified Chinese only
Generated content requires human review for quality and accuracy
Topics are limited to Chinese-language hot list sources

faq.question: What is Defou x Stanley style?
faq.answer: A popular Chinese content style combining minimalist contrarian insights with deep psychological analysis and viral hooks.

faq.question: Does this skill require API keys?
faq.answer: Yes, you need an Anthropic API key in your .env file to generate content. It works in mock mode without one.

faq.question: What languages does it support?
faq.answer: The skill generates content in Simplified Chinese only. Topic sources are from Chinese platforms.

faq.question: How many topics does it process?
faq.answer: By default, it fetches the top 50 trending items and selects the best 10 for content generation.

faq.question: Where are files saved?
faq.answer: Output files are saved to: outputs/defou-stanley-posts/ directory as Markdown files.

faq.question: Can I customize the content style?
faq.answer: The skill generates three versions per topic: Stanley style (viral), Defou style (deep), and Combo style.
